sense.def:
To promote something
pomeni prizadevati si, da bi se nekaj zgodilo, povečalo ali postalo bolj priljubljeno.

cit.quote: spodbujati, pospeševati, delati reklamo za nekaj

seg.quote: The government could do more to promote economic growth.
The new town was vigorously promoted as an ideal place to settle.
There are government controls on the promotion of cigarettes.

sense.def:
To be promoted
pomeni dobiti pomembnejše delovno mesto.

seg.quote: He had recently been promoted to captain.
What are your chances of promotion?
